wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier General William Kaye Legge  (1869-1946) was a senior British Army officer during the First World War.

response: *William Kaye Legge (1869–1946), senior British Army officer during World War I

* Mary Garnier; eldest daughter, married in 1868 Hon. Charles Gounter Legge, chief constable, and was mother of William Kaye Legge.
